title: A true discourse, vpon the matter of Martha Brossier of Romorantin pretended to be possessed by a deuill. Translated out of French into English, by Abraham Hartvvel.
author: Marescot, Michel, 1539-1605, attributed name. aut
publisher: Imprinted by [F. Kingston for] Iohn Wolfe,
notes: Variously attributed to Michel Marescot, Simon Pietre and Le Bouthillier--MIU.
A translation by Abraham Hartwell of: Discours veritable sur le faicte de Marthe Brossier.
French dedication signed: Phisitians of Paris--STC.
Reproduction of the original in Emmanuel College (University of Cambridge). Library.
